product.name: Wilson Thick Solid Floating Wood Mantel Shelf (Display as Floating Shelf or Fireplace Mantel, Match Any Home Decor from Contemporary to Rustic) (3" Thick x 7.5" - 8" Wide) (36 Inches, Coffee)
product.description:
Welcome to Michigan's Pristine Upper Peninsula, where Wilson Enterprises has been in operation since the late 1980's.
Wilson proudly offers only the finest in decorative fireplace logs, seasoned firewood, birch and basswood crafting products and home décor, hand hewn and timber mantels and shelves, and tongue and groove paneling in cedar, aspen, pine and more!
We procure our materials from regional forests. All of our products are skillfully hand cut, and kiln-dried to ensure their longevity.
Sharing the beauty of the Upper Peninsula with everyone has driven us since the beginning to find new ways to decorate your home.
Each product is handled and created with care by our trained staff.
From Rustic to Contemporary
This thick solid wood mantel shelf is made for a variety of displays. From a floating shelf in an office to a fireplace mantel in your home our mantel shelves can be used in many different home decor styles from contemporary modern to rustic farmhouse. Our 3-inch thick and 8-inch wide solid wood shelves give you a rough cut look while our unique sanding process gives them a nice clean finish. These mantel shelves will look great in a variety of places. Popular choices are often the kitchen, living room, or bedroom. Longer variations are often used as a mantel above a fireplace or as a showpiece shelf hung on the wall to display family photos, books, collectibles, or other home decor. Our American-made mantel shelf comes with no hardware, as it can be displayed in a variety of ways and match different home aesthetics. Popular mounting options are a traditional mantel and floating wall mount. Product dimensions may vary slightly being that it is a natural wood product. With five color options available, our shelves will fit right in with the decor in your home. Located in Michigan's Upper Peninsula, family owned and operated Wilson has produced high quality firewood and kiln-dried real wood products for multiple decorative and crafting projects since 1985.
12", 18", 24", 36", 48", 60", 72" Available
12", 18", 24", 36", 48", 60", 72" Available
12", 18", 24", 36", 48", 60", 72" Available
12", 18", 24", 36", 48", 60", 72" Available
12", 18", 24", 36", 48", 60", 72" Available
Wilson harvests and produces all our products in the upper peninsula of Michigan. Each one handled by our skilled craftsmen to ensure the highest quality product delivered to your home.
WARNING: This is a natural product, with zero chemical treatments or additives. Burning this product can expose you to soot, which is known in the State of California to cause cancer, and carbon monoxide, which is known in the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65warnings.ca.gov.
product.bullet_points:
• Display as Contemporary or Rustic, this wood shelf mantel creates a unique visual centerpiece above a fireplace in any room, or is stunning simply hung as a shelving display for family photos, collections, or other home décor
• Wooden beam harvested from Michigan's Upper Peninsula and is 2.75" to 3" thick and 7.5" to 8" wide
• Includes 1 thick solid wood beam mantel shelf, measuring 72" long; mounting hardware NOT included
• Natural wood products are proudly made in the USA, in Michigan's Upper Peninsula
• Each mantel piece is unique with saw marks, nail holes, and knots
• All mantel shelves are 2.75"- 3" thick and 7.5"- 8" wide
• Smooth Sanded
• No Hardware Included, recommended to consult with contractor for installation
• Display as floating shelf or fireplace mantel
